title: Noam Chomsky: Why Israel-Palestine 'Peace Negotiations' are a Complete Farce
description:
This week my guest is Noam Chomsky - Professor Chomsky needs obviously no introduction, but here it is, he's an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic and political activist - sometimes called the father of modern linguistics.

He has been at the MIT - Massachusetts Institute of Technology since 1955, He now holds joint appointments as Institute Professor Emeritus at MIT and Laureate Professor at the University of Arizona. He's the author of more than 100 books on topics, such as linguistics, war, politics, and mass media. He's one of the leading Titans in scientific thinking for me personally. A voice of reason!

In this podcast - Noam sheds light on the Oslo Accords at 29 - and why Israel-Palestine 'Peace Negotiations' are a Complete Farce!
